SEARCH
Package entity

Class HDBManager

java.lang.Object
entity.User
entity.HDBManager
public class HDBManager extends User
The HDBManager class represents administrators who manage BTO housing projects.

HDB Managers are responsible for:

  • Creating and managing BTO projects
  • Reviewing and processing applications
  • Approving or rejecting HDB Officer registrations
  • Responding to project enquiries
  • Generating reports on applications

Managers cannot create projects with overlapping application periods to ensure they can properly manage each project during its active phase.

    • removeCreatedProject

      public boolean removeCreatedProject(BTOProject project)
      Removes a project from the manager's list of managed projects.

      This is typically used when a project is deleted from the system.

      Parameters:
      project - The project to remove
      Returns:
      true if the project was removed, false if it wasn't in the list

    • canHandleNewProject

      public boolean canHandleNewProject(BTOProject newProject)
      Determines if this manager can handle a new BTO project.

      A manager cannot handle projects with overlapping application periods to ensure proper focus and management during active application phases.

      Parameters:
      newProject - The new project to check
      Returns:
      true if the manager can handle this new project, false otherwise
